channel.title: Making some code with one problem

item.title: Making some code with one problem
item.dc:creator: @D_A_N D A N
item.description:
@D_A_N wrote:

Ive been working on some code to make a command that makes a tele command, works fine apart from one problem : I cant add the "s around the commandname. For exampleâ€¦

 BufferedWriter bw = null;
String telemaker = command.substring(8);   

try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("teles.txt", true));
	 bw.write("else if(command.startsWith("+telemaker+")) {");

I cant make the " around telemakeras it makes an error. Just wondered if there was anyway to do this Thanks anyway.

Read full topic
